beats.visual: Vacuum eyes glow mega as it unfolds tiny arms.
Duchess straps socks like boxing gloves and grins.
beats.gag_note: Training montage vibes in one beat.

beats.visual: Vacuum launches feather duster drones in spiral attack.
Duchess wall-runs along couch, tail deflecting dust laser.
Vacuum powers up tornado mode, carpets flap dramatically.
beats.gag_note: TV remote clings for dear life.

beats.visual: Duchess summons pile of lint sidekicks to chant cheers.
Vacuum slips on stray yarn; dramatic slow spin mid-air.
Duchess boops power button with heroic paw pose.
Vacuum ejects trophy pile of rescued socks as Duchess bows.

tts_line: Duchess refuses to lose another sock trophy.
style_prompt: cartoon elegant black cat, satin sheen, clean bold outlines, flat jewel-tone accents, soft rim light, dynamic angle, vertical 9:16, living room robo vacuum duel with cartoon energy beams, fast cuts, vertical 9:16
